page.shortlink: api desktop api ui get list2p function
page.description: Prompts user for selection from a CR-LF delimited list of choices. Style: 1 = single select, 2 = multi-select (click item to select), 3 = multi-select (Shift+Click, Ctrl+Click and Drag are supported). Same as ui_get_list2(), but returns a pointer with .lastbutton and .selection properties.
page.syntax: P ui_get_list2P(C title ,C default ,C choices [,N style [,L preserve_selection_order [,L flagOwnerDraw [,C headingText [,N height [,N width ]]]]]])
